body: Simplify accounting processes while managing shipping costs by using QuickBooks® from Intuit®—a UPS Ready® provider—and the UPS Billing Center together. UPS technology is integrated into QuickBooks, so you can process U.S. and international shipments in QuickBooks Shipping Manager, streamlining accounting for UPS shipments. Then accelerate viewing, paying, and allocating costs for your shipping invoices in the UPS Billing Center.
title: How can I handle accounting process
